name: The Night of the Dancing Dead!
name_original: The Night of the Dancing Dead!
description:
The Night of the Dancing Dead is an indie game developed by students from het Grafisch Lyceum Utrecht for the International Educations Game Jam.

The credits are contained in the game itself, and this is non-profit.

https://trello.com/b/ZR6lvqJT/gamejam-groep-32
